title: Perfect Soft-Boiled Egg Recipe
full_text:
Perfect Soft-Boiled Egg Recipe
Jump to recipe
Prep

Serves
1
to 6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
quarts
(
2.8
L
)
water
1 to 6
large
eggs
Directions
Bring water to a gentle simmer in a medium pot. Gently lower eggs into water with a slotted spoon or strainer (do not drop eggs into water, as they might crack). Cook for exactly 6 minutes, then remove eggs with slotted spoon and serve (see note).
Serious Eats / Julia Estrada
Special Equipment
Medium pot
,
slotted spoon
Notes
For the best way to remove their shells, see
our explainer on peeling steamed and boiled eggs
